summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3084, for the improvement of the alley in blocks 14 and 17, University Park Addition, being the alley between University Boulevard and 16th Avenue Northeast, and East 45th Street and East 50th Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37464 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
